name: MULTIGON
description:
A Music Rhythm game where you need to hit the right notes at the right time.

How to play: one key controls one side of Multigon. You need to hit the right key in order to hit the notes. Notes are little polygon shapes that approach your Multigon. When Polygon hits one of your Multigon sides, you need to press the key, that controls that side. Those keys can be found/changed in the settings menu.

NOTE: Game Built and submitted literally on the last second, so expect bugs, rough edges. I mismanaged my time unfortunately. 

Game has Synthwave tracks from artist "HOME" that are exceptionally catchy and have steady Rhythm.
